thread.title: Nexenta CEO Tarkan Maner Joins Workspot Advisory Board

author: cnbc.com
title: Nexenta CEO Tarkan Maner Joins Workspot Advisory Board

organizations.name: nexenta ceo tarkan maner joins workspot advisory board

text:
CUPERTINO, Calif., March 15, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- Workspot, the leader in cloud-based VDI services on Microsoft Azure, today announced that Tarkan Maner, chairman and CEO at Nexenta, has joined the Workspot Advisory Board.
Click to Tweet : .@Workspot is excited to welcome @Nexenta CEO @TarkanManer to the Workspot Advisory Board! #VDI #Azure #DesktopCloud
With Tarkan's 20 years as a global executive operator, investor and IT adviser, including his tenure as CEO of Wyse Technology and current leadership at Nexenta, he brings to the advisory board a deep understanding of the end user computing and cloud challenges that Workspot addresses.
Tarkan's expertise in security, software-defined infrastructure, mobility, virtualization and cloud computing will provide unmatched perspective as the company sharpens execution in a high-growth environment.
Amitabh Sinha, CEO and co-founder of Workspot, said: "We are excited to have Tarkan join the Workspot Advisory Board at a time when Workspot's Desktop Cloud is growing globally. Increasingly, our customers are buying our Desktop Cloud solution as easily as they would buy a PC or a thin client. Tarkan's experience at Nexenta, Wyse and Dell will prove to be invaluable to Workspot as we continue a high-growth trajectory."
Tarkan Maner, Workspot advisory board member, said : "From the early days of enabling VDI for Wyse thin client customers to my current experience at Nexenta where our software-defined storage solutions are supporting and enabling cloud deployments, I have understood the cost and complexity of VDI. The strength of Workspot's solution, combined with its simplicity, no-risk engagement model and free deployment services, positions Workspot for rapid growth."
